#include<bits/stdc++.h>

typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	ll l,ans,flag,c,count(0),t,diff,i;
	char no[100010];
	cin>>no;
	l = strlen(no);
	if(l<=2)
		ans = atoi(no);
	else
	{
		ans = (90*(l-2) + 9) ;
		flag = 10*(no[0]-'0') + (no[1] - '0');
		flag = flag - 10;
		diff = (no[1]-no[0]+10)%10;
		c = no[1] - '0';
		for(i=2;i<l;i++)
		{
			t = (c+diff)%10;
			if(t == no[i]-'0')
				continue;
			else if(t < no[i]-'0')
			{
				count = 1;
				ans = ans+flag+1;
				break;
			}
			else
			{
				count = 1;
				ans = ans+flag;
				break;
			}
			c = t;
		}
		if(count == 0)
		{
			ans = ans + flag +1;
		}	
	}
	cout << ans << endl;
	return 0;
}
